text:
In the Ant User Manual page at
http://jakarta.apache.org/ant/manual/using.html (as of
2001-04-11), in the "Path-like Structures" section, a paragraph
says:

  Builds a path that holds the value of ${classpath}, followed by all jar 
  files in the lib directory, followed by the classes directory.

This paragraph should probably begin as "The above example builds..."
or at least "This builds ..."
creator: Daniel.Barclay@digitalfocus.com
